import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', }) export class HomeComponent { }

Welcome to HomeToGo

Featured Rentals

About Us

HomeToGo is your gateway to discovering cozy homes, exciting experiences, and new adventures...

How It Works

Begin your journey with HomeToGo. Browse through a myriad of listings, connect with hosts...

Why Choose HomeToGo

With HomeToGo, you're not just booking a place to stay, but a home away from home...

Testimonials

"Booking with HomeToGo was a breeze. The host was friendly, the home was cozy..." - Sarah M.
